title: You need help publishing you little bitch?
description: These cmds allow you to post the current msg to a channel.

fields.name: corn?channels
fields.value: Get a list of all channel_ids you can post to.

fields.name: corn?publish [channel_id]
fields.value: Publish the current msg to the channel_id. Requires confirmation.

fields.name: corn?speak [channel_id] [message]
fields.value: Sends a normal discord message to the specified chanel. Requires confirmation.

fields.name: corn?roles
fields.value: Get a list of all roles you can ping.

fields.name: corn?ping [role_name] [channel_id] [ping_msg]
fields.value: Ping a role with a particular message. Social media pings have a unique embed color.
